metadata.description: Inventory - when we run "Admin | Sync Template v2 (Check Deleted)", delete the items from CoE (yes) or just mark deleted (no)
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/
Inventory - If Yes, will run a delay step to assist with the Dataverse health. Only turn to No for debugging.

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

parameters.$filter: admin_objectname eq '@{workflow()?['tags']['flowDisplayName']}'
admin_objectname eq '@{workflow()?['tags']['flowDisplayName']}'

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date

parameters.$filter: admin_environmentdeleted eq false
admin_environmentname eq '@{items('Mark_deleted')?['EnvtName']}'

Clean_up_branch.inputs: this side is doing a bunch of cleanup work

parameters.$filter: admin_environmentdeleted eq true and admin_environmentdeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_flowactiondetaildeleted eq true and admin_flowactiondetaildeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_flowdeleted eq true and admin_flowdeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_pvadeleted eq true and admin_pvadeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_businessprocessflowdeleted eq true and admin_businessprocessflowdeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_solutiondeleted eq true and admin_solutiondeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_aideleted eq true and admin_aideletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}
admin_appdeleted eq true and admin_appdeletedon lt @{body('Get_old_deletes_time')}

Remove_old_deleted_items_from_CoE_invent.description: If set to clean up old deletes do that for things marked delete gt 2 months ago

parameters.$filter: admin_solutiondeleted ne true and admin_SolutionEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_businessprocessflowdeleted ne true and admin_BusinessProcessFlowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_rpadeleted ne true and admin_DesktopflowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_connectordeleted ne true and admin_EnvironmentCustomConnector/admin_environmentdeleted eq true and admin_iscustomapi eq true
admin_pvadeleted ne true and admin_PVAEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_aideleted ne true and admin_AiEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_flowdeleted ne true and admin_FlowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_appdeleted ne true and admin_AppEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true

Call_each_object_type_helper_for_this_en.inputs: Call each object type helper for this environment

parameters.$select: admin_environmentid, admin_environmentsku, admin_hascds, admin_environmentname, admin_environmentcdsmetadataname, admin_environmentdeletedon
parameters.$filter: admin_environmentdeleted eq false and admin_excusefrominventory eq false

Delay_1_to_300_minutes.description: For Dataverse service health, we will randomize the start time of these flows for tenants within a 5 hour range
